de.hlu.ust
Class Money

java.lang.Object
  de.hlu.ust.Money

public class Money
extends java.lang.Object

The Money class stores the Money value in Cent * 10.

The class implements some methods für parsing, printing, rounding and calculating VAT ant net values.

There is no check for overrun because the intern presentation as long alows to store 92.233.720.368.547.758 Euros.

Field Detail

ROUND_DOWN_TENTH_CENTS

public static final int ROUND_DOWN_TENTH_CENTS
ROUND_DOWN_TENTH_CENTS rounds the last Cent digit to zero, e.g. "1.17" to "1.10".

See Also:
Constant Field Values

ROUND_MERCANTILE

public static final int ROUND_MERCANTILE
ROUND_MERCANTILE (kaufmännisches Runden) rounds 1...5 to this digit and 6...9 to the next one. E.g. "1.125" to "1.12"

See Also:
